TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapOperationBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: Représente une extension ajoutée à dans un service Web XML.

span.span: Represents an extension added to an within an XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette classe spécifie que la transmission des messages utilisera SOAP et fournit des détails sur la mise en forme du message SOAP.This class specifies that the message transmission will use SOAP and provides details about how the SOAP message will be formatted. Pour plus d’informations sur la spécification des protocoles pour les services Web XML, consultez [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). Pour plus d’informations sur les services Internet (WSDL, Web Services Description Language), consultez la spécification à http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapOperationBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapoperationbinding.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapOperationBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapoperationbinding.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapOperationBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapoperationbinding.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette propriété est requise pour la liaison de protocole HTTP de SOAP.This property is required for HTTP protocol binding of SOAP. La valeur par défaut est une chaîne vide ("").The default value is an empty string (""). ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapprotocol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapprotocol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapprotocol.vb#6)]
